content:
advertisement

Like rock n roll rap originates in a sense of frustration and anger PERIOD

The best music has traditionally come from the most fed up PERIOD

Rap groups like Public Enemy NWA and Ice Cube have paved the way to success and the suburbs on a dissonant tip PERIOD But the exception to the rule is the Beastie Boys PERIOD The Boys honed distinct territory  minus the rage PERIOD

On their new album Check Your Head  they dish a domestic hardcore forged with funky grooves James Brown would do time for PERIOD Going further than the marketable funk thing they MC through other genres like folk reggae rhythm and blues and jazz PERIOD

Since the adolescent primal scream of License to Ill  the band has used humor prominently PERIOD The difference with this set is they play live and direct PERIOD

The Beasties use their instruments on the majority of the tracks PERIOD Since the Boys were once fullfledged hardcore the band felt right at home PERIOD

 said Adam Horovitz AdRock PERIOD 

During studio time the band recorded everything amplified PERIOD

 Horovitz said PERIOD 

Talking about the album with Horovitz one gets stream of consciousness sprinkled with short sentences like  or  When discussing the album one  highlight for him was working on a song with Biz Markie and guitar virtuoso Ted Nugent called 

 Horovitz said in a hushed voice PERIOD 

Unlike the Boys last effort Pauls Boutique  the new album contains very few samples PERIOD A lot of samples are of the band playing live Horovitz said PERIOD

Horovitzs favorite track off Check Your Head is  which is just a sample of the keyboardist Mark Ramos Nishita on a bus with two tape recorders PERIOD

 Horovitz said PERIOD

Out of the studio Horovitz is exicted about his house he shares with his girlfriend  actress Ione Skye  and a friend PERIOD

 Horovitz said PERIOD 

Horovitz attests that he Adam Yauch and Mike Diamond are best friends outside of the band PERIOD When not playing basketball youll find them at the Groove Merchant in San Fransisco PERIOD

Collecting records is a passion that takes up most of their time PERIOD Not a day goes by without a glance through the racks PERIOD Deep within the annals of pop culture the band finds tasty nuggets to savor PERIOD

 Horovitz said PERIOD

The group plans to leave its friends and hangouts behind for a summer tour PERIOD They hope to do some shows with Firehose and possibly Superchunk PERIOD

Though Horovitz said he will miss his friends he is excited to get back on the road this time minus the inflatable penises PERIOD On their last tour the Boys brought along lots of rubberized male genitalia. to keep listeners in check before the tour the Boys released  as the first single PERIOD  will follow PERIOD The album sold out on the day of its release April  said Bruce Shamma owner of Blue Train Compact Disc  E PERIOD College Ave PERIOD

 Horovitz said PERIOD
